title: Winter Fruit Salad with Lemon Poppy Seed Dressing
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons caster sugar', '125ml lemon juice', '2 teaspoons diced onion', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '160ml olive or vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon poppy seeds', '1 romaine (cos) lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces', '100g grated Gruyere or Manchego cheese', '100g cashews', '30g dried cranberries', '1 apple - peeled, cored and diced', '1 pear - peeled, cored and sliced']
